On Fri, 23 May 2003, Shigeki Miyake-Stoner wrote:

> You must have been playing in skirmish mode... either that or cheating... :)

Nope. I was playing in "battle" difficulty (forgot to change it to
slaughter), and I didn't cheat. There are a few reasons I was able to beat
the game. One is that I had no computer allies to worry about, so just me
on my own was the entire team. Then comes the fact that once a thief gets
to a high enough level, he can pretty much permenately stay cloaked, which
basically means that as long as you eliminate druids and don't pick fights
with ghosts, you're really not gonna be harmed at all by AI players. The
third reason is, of course, slime farming :-)

- Yan
